attribs.name: spells_level_1_macro_var
attribs.current: [Cure Wounds](~repeating_spell1_-kdloedvmz78pwctzjka_spell), [Bless](~repeating_spell1_-kdloedwbfowy8xabp-c_spell), [Shield of Faith](~repeating_spell1_-kdloedwbfowy8xabp-d_spell), [Thunderous Smite](~repeating_spell1_-kdloedxaafeablmueme_spell)

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: All the demons I have faced are too easy, I want a challenge

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: You should protect others and the world you live in, even if you should die

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I do everything for my god, so that one day she will reward me with what I always wanted

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I never take a fight seriously unless I know it will be hard.

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes
attribs.current:
NECKLACE OF PRAYER B EADS
Wondrous item, very rare (requires attunement by a cleric,
druid, or paladin)
This necklace has 5 magic beads made from topaz. It also has many nonmagical beads made from stones such as amber, bloodstone, citrine, coral, jade, pearl, or quartz. If a magic bead is removed from the necklace, that bead
loses its magic.
4x bless per day.
1x cure wounds(2nd level)/lesser restoration per day.
Crush the bead and as a bonus action cast the spell. Beads recover each morning at sunrise.
Sentinel feat
When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, the creature's speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.
Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from you even if they take the disengage action before leaving your reach.
When a creature within 5ft of you makes an attack against a target other than you (and that target doesn't have this feat), you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against the attacking creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDVmZ78pWCTzjKa_content
attribs.current: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDWbFoWy8Xabp-c_content
attribs.current: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDWbFoWy8Xabp-d_materials
attribs.current: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDWbFoWy8Xabp-d_content
attribs.current: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDXAAfEABLMUEmE_content
attribs.current: The first time you hit with a melee weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon rings with thunder that is audible within 300 feet of you, and the attack deals an extra 2d6 thunder damage to the target. Additionally, if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you and knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KdloeDXAAfEABLMUEmF_materials
attribs.current: A tiny strip of white cloth

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KdloeDXAAfEABLMUEmF_content
attribs.current: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KdloeDXAAfEABLMUEmG_content
attribs.current:
You summon a spirit that assumes the form of an unusually intelligent, strong, and loyal steed, creating a long-lasting bond with it. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the steed takes on a form that you choose, such as a warhorse, a pony, a camel, an elk, or a mastiff. (Your DM might allow other animals to be summoned as steeds.) The steed has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a celestial, fey, or fiend (your choice) instead of its normal type. Additionally, if your steed has an Intelligence of 5 or less, its Intelligence becomes 6, and it gains the ability to understand one language of your choice that you speak.

Your steed serves you as a mount, both in combat and out, and you have an instinctive bond with it that allows you to fight as a seamless unit. While mounted on your steed, you can make any spell you cast that targets only you also target your steed.

When the steed drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. You can also dismiss your steed at any time as an action, causing it to disappear. In either case, casting this spell again summons the same steed, restored to its hit point maximum.

While your steed is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with it telepathically.

You can't have more than one steed bonded by this spell at a time. As an action, you can release the steed from its bond at any time, causing it to disappear.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KdloeDXAAfEABLMUEmH_content
attribs.current:
The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during this spell’s duration, you weapon flares with a bright light, and the attack deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the spell ends.

A creature blinded by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer blinded.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KdloeDYlrrIAFMkUQR0_content
attribs.current: Holy power radiates from you in an aura with a 30-foot radius, awakening boldness in friendly creatures. Until the spell ends, the aura moves with you, centered on you. While in the aura, each nonhostile creature in the aura (including you) deals an extra 1d4 radiant damage when it hits with a weapon attack.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KdloeDYlrrIAFMkUQR1_content
attribs.current:
You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range. Until the spell ends, a creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't speak a deliberate lie while in the radius. You know whether each creature succeeds or fails on its saving throw.

An affected creature is aware of the spell and can thus avoid answering questions to which it would normally respond with a lie. Such creatures can be evasive in its answers as long as it remains within the boundaries of the truth.

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KdloeDYlrrIAFMkUQR2_materials
attribs.current: Diamonds worth 300gp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell3_-KdloeDYlrrIAFMkUQR2_content
attribs.current: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

attribs.name: saving_throw_query_var
attribs.current: ?{Saving Throw|Strength +8,{{title=Strength Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{strength_formula} + @{strength_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{strength_formula} + @{strength_saving_throw_mod}]]}}|Dexterity +3,{{title=Dexterity Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{dexterity_formula} + @{dexterity_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{dexterity_formula} + @{dexterity_saving_throw_mod}]]}}|Constitution +4,{{title=Constitution Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{constitution_formula} + @{constitution_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{constitution_formula} + @{constitution_saving_throw_mod}]]}}|Intelligence +3,{{title=Intelligence Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{intelligence_formula} + @{intelligence_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{intelligence_formula} + @{intelligence_saving_throw_mod}]]}}|Wisdom +9,{{title=Wisdom Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{wisdom_formula} + @{wisdom_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{wisdom_formula} + @{wisdom_saving_throw_mod}]]}}|Charisma +11,{{title=Charisma Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{charisma_formula} + @{charisma_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{charisma_formula} + @{charisma_saving_throw_mod}]]}}|Death +0, {{title=Death Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{death_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{@{roll_setting}=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + @{death_saving_throw_mod}]]}} {{death_saving_throw_successes=@{death_saving_throw_successes}}} {{death_saving_throw_failures=@{death_saving_throw_failures}}}}

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-KUKQ3kedCQf2rZoZdO5_attack_string
attribs.current: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDVmZ78pWCTzjKa_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell1_-KdloeDWbFoWy8Xabp-c_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell2_-KdloeDXAAfEABLMUEmF_higher_level
attribs.current: At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vamVnFM-40LuY8w_content
attribs.current: The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor, and powerful good rings like heavenly music in your ears. As an action, you can open your awareness to detect such forces. Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet of you that is not behind total cover. You know the type (celestial, fiend, or undead) of any being whose presence you sense, but not its identity (the vampire Count Strahd von Zarovich, for instance). Within the same radius, you also detect the presence of any place or object that has been consecrated or desecrated, as with the hallow spell.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vao3jwpE42-uCN7_content
attribs.current:
Your blessed touch can heal wounds. As an action, you can touch a creature to restore a number of hit points to that creature.
Alternatively, you can expend 5 hit points from your pool of healing to cure the target of one disease or neutralize one poison affecting it. You can cure multiple diseases and neutralize multiple poisons with a single use of Lay on Hands, expending hit points separately for each one.
This feature has no effect on undead and constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vapPR5NkGBhQgo7_content
attribs.current: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vapPR5NkGBhQgo8_content
attribs.current: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options. You can't take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again. Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, or Protection.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vaqzLPir27VN2Sp_content
attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is 2d8 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus 1d8 for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of 5d8. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is an undead or a fiend.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vaqzLPir27VN2Sq_content
attribs.current: The divine magic flowing through you makes you immune to disease.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vaqzLPir27VN2Sr_content
attribs.current: Your oath allows you to channel divine energy to fuel magical effects. Each Channel Divinity option provided by your oath explains how to use it.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4varhiUGwJ5lgZbh_content
attribs.current: Whenever you or a friendly creature within 10 feet of you must make a saving throw, the creature gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to [[@{charisma_mod}]] (with a minimum bonus of +1). You must be conscious to grant this bonus.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vatm8gcBKjRyPlw_content
attribs.current: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you can't be frightened while you are conscious.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vauLEtRwzPbJ-im_content
attribs.current: You are so suffused with righteous might that all your melee weapon strikes carry divine power with them. Whenever you hit a creature with a melee weapon, the creature takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage. If you also use your Divine Smite with an attack, you add this damage to the extra damage of your Divine Smite.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vauLEtRwzPbJ-in_content
attribs.current: You can use your action to end one spell on yourself or on one willing creature that you touch.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vauLEtRwzPbJ-io_content
attribs.current:
You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options. You can't take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

Defense
While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

Dueling
When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

Great Weapon Fighting
When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2. The weapon must have the two-handed or versatile property for you to gain this benefit.

Protection
When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4vaqzLPir27VN2Sp_other_damage_string
attribs.current: ((?{Spell Level|1|2|3|4+, 4} + 1)d8) radiant damage plus 4 (1d8) vs undead or fiend damage.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KgU4xJNpRoKj6SZjzgq_content
attribs.current: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
